snippet: In the third inning, Derek Jeter fouled a ball hard off his left foot. He was visibly limping throughout the game and was finally pulled after striking out to end the eighth.
abstract: New York Yankees shortstop Derek Jeter, who injured in his foot in Game 3 of American League division series against Baltimore Orioles, plans to play in Game 4.
lead_paragraph: In the third inning, Derek Jeter fouled a ball hard off his left foot. He was visibly limping throughout the game and was finally pulled after striking out to end the eighth.

headline.main: Limping Jeter Is Pulled, but He Plans to Play Game 4
headline.print_headline: Limping Jeter Is Pulled, but He Plans to Play Game 4
